name: Animal Senses
summary: You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: darkvision, low-light vision, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet.
description:
You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: darkvision, low-light vision, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet. You must have low-light vision before you can gain darkvision with this feat. If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain that sense with this feat.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different sense each time.Traits

Beastkin: Humanoids that can partially or fully transform into animal forms.
